quotes.quote: When you start out in a team, you have to get the teamwork going and then you get something back.
The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.
If a team is to reach its potential, each player must be willing to subordinate his personal goals to the good of the team.
Many activities and team play participation will give you a training that will prove invaluable later on in life.
Teamwork requires some sacrifice up front; people who work as a team have to put the collective needs of the group ahead of their individual interests.
So powerful is the light of unity that it can illuminate the whole earth.
Teamwork is so important that it is virtually impossible for you to reach the heights of your capabilities or make the money that you want without becoming very good at it.
Individually, we are one drop. Together, we are an ocean.
If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.
With an enthusiastic team you can achieve almost anything.
Teamwork divides the task and multiplies the success.
A group becomes a team when each member is sure enough of himself and his contribution to praise the skills of others.
Build for your team a feeling of oneness, of dependence on one another and of strength to be derived by unity.
A successful team is a group of many hands and one mind.
Unity is strength. When there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved.
The work of a team should always embrace a great player but the great player must always work.
Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
Individual commitment to a group effort â€“ that's what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships.
The main ingredient of stardom is the rest of the team.
A team is more than a collection of people. It is a process of give and take.
No one can whistle a symphony. It takes a whole orchestra to play it.
Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success.
Teamwork makes the dream work.
It is the long history of humankind (and animal kind, too) those who learned to collaborate and improvise most effectively have prevailed.
Cooperation is the thorough conviction that nobody can get there unless everybody gets there.
Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
There is no such thing as a self-made man. You will reach your goals only with the help of others.
Success stories, whether by individuals or organizations, are almost always the result of collaborative effort among many people who are united by a single goal and vision.
